# Finally, modern recruitment software for legal
Hiring the best legal talent requires strategic sourcing and a streamlined process. Flo Recruit Applicant Tracking is the only ATS that connects law firms directly to qualified candidates, agencies, data insights, and live customer support.
From hybrid events to interviews, we help you build best-in-class legal recruiting programs that candidates and employees love.
[Get in Touch](https://florecruit.com/</request-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d463e2dac9dde5bf0eac995/6307493365bd555869e500c3_swoosh-fade.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d463e2dac9dde5bf0eac995/63074905518abcf42cc5f28b_swoosh-bot.svg)
95+
BigLaw and Midsize law firm clients
110+
Law school and consortium clients
55%+
AmLaw 100 Law Firms
65%+
Top 100 U.S. Law Schools
Since agencies can self-serve with Flo Recruit, we've eliminated the same candidate getting submitted from different agencies and streamlined a previously time-consuming, manual process.
![Luke Kyaw](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d463e2dac9dde5bf0eac995/6459de7b82989c680a5b56a3_Samantha-Lia_1963A-Print%20\(1\)%202.png)

generated_description:
Flo Recruit is an innovative legal recruiting platform that aims to streamline the hiring processes for law firms and law schools. Founded in 2019 and backed by Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S19, the company is headquartered in Austin, TX, and employs a team of 35 passionate individuals. Their mission is simple yet impactful: "We help law firms hire the best legal talent faster."

Their flagship product, the Flo Recruit Applicant Tracking System (ATS), is designed specifically for the legal sector. It allows law firms to connect directly with qualified candidates, agencies, and valuable data insights, all while providing live customer support. This means no more competing candidates submitted by multiple agencies‚Äîa huge time-saver.

Flo Recruit's offerings include:

1. **Applicant Tracking System**: Tailored ATS for legal firms.
2. **Interviews**: Both virtual and in-person interview solutions.
3. **Outreach Events**: Help firms build candidate pipelines before applicants even apply.
4. **Work Allocation**: Efficiently manage and distribute work among team members.

For law schools, Flo Recruit provides virtual interview processes and events, ensuring students have the opportunities they need to kickstart their careers. They also offer tools that allow law schools to improve employment outcomes for their students.

Currently, Flo Recruit is ramping up its capabilities with new features, including a unique event exclusively for employers regarding OCI access. They've also laid the groundwork for hosting hybrid events that combine in-person and online networking.

Flo Recruit has already attracted over 200 clients, including more than 55% of the AmLaw 100 and many prestigious law schools. They've been recognized for reshaping how legal recruiting functions, making it not just quicker but also more effective and equitable.

If you're a law firm or a legal educational institution looking to modernize your hiring process, Flo Recruit presents a compelling solution that maps perfectly to the needs of today's legal landscape. You can learn more and request a demo on their website, [Flo Recruit](https://florecruit.com).
